name: Devil Slayer
description:
◆ Control
↑↓→← Move
Z Confirm
X Cancel/Menu
Q H-Event Menu
Ctrl Skip Dialogue

◆ Content
R18 Fantasy RPG
Basic HCG x20 with Animation
R*pe/Prostitution/Monster Sex

◆ Story
Princess Sibera leads an army to fight the devils near the borderline.
A dangerous and erotic adventure is waiting for her and her friends.

◆ Trick
The password of the statue south of the village is 1127. You’ll get EXP bonus if you use it.

◆ Character

【Sibera】Princess of Batonia
As knight, she leads her army to the dangerous battle ground to defend her kingdom.
Weapon: Halberd/Sword


【Maria】Knight commander and Sibera’s best friend.
She and Sibera got separated at the beginning.
Weapon: Large Sword/Sword


【Claudia】A mercenary and former gladiator.
Weapon: Sword
